sentences.en: An appeal or prayer for evil or misfortune befall someone or something.
sentences.cn: 让病祸或不幸降于某人或某物上的请求或祈祷.

sentences.en: Bad luck may befall to anyone at any time.
sentences.cn: 任何人任何时候都可能交噩运倒霉.

sentences.en: But a terrible disaster was to befall Beethoven.
sentences.cn: 可是一场可怕的灾难就要降临到贝多芬头上.

sentences.en: Could this fate befall James Cameron, Hollywood's most daring and extravagant auteur?
sentences.cn: 这个厄运有可能降临詹姆斯?卡梅伦这位好莱坞最大胆、最敢花钱的大导演身上 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dream, love, happy just like meteor and snowflake befall us fortunately.
sentences.cn: 梦想, 爱情, 快乐,就像是幸运地落在我们身边流星和雪花.

sentences.en: He fears bad luck may befall.
Heaven only knew what disasters would befall him then.
sentences.cn: 那么一来,有什么不幸会发生,只有天知道了.

sentences.en: I am prepared for the worst that can Befall me.
sentences.cn: 我已,准备好了应付可能发生的最坏的情形.

sentences.en: I fear some evil will befall.
sentences.cn: 我怕将要发生甚么不幸.

sentences.en: Some tragedy will befall a person who walks under a ladder.
sentences.cn: 如果谁要是从梯子底下走过去的话,那么厄运就要来了.

sentences.en: They were unaware of the fate that was to befall them.
sentences.cn: 他们并不知道即将降临到他们头上的厄运。

sentences.en: Though war and danger were in store, but it might not befall for months to come.
sentences.cn: 战争和危险虽然避免不了, 可是说不定要到好几个月以后才开火.

sentences.en: We prayed that no harm should befall them.
sentences.cn: 我们祈求他们平安无事。

sentences.en: Whatever might befall now, he must on to his journey's end.
sentences.cn: 现在他已是无论如何非到巴黎不可了.

sentences.en: When these befall you, never give up.
sentences.cn: 但当这些降临到你身上时, 千万不要放弃.

sentences.en: Who can predict the misery that may befall humankind?
sentences.cn: 谁又能够预测可能降临到人类头上的灾难 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: if something unpleasant or dangerous befalls you, it happens to you

trans.tran_cn: 降临到（某人）头上，发生，降临
